mapper.select: SELECT course_id, member_id, title, content, hit, created_date, updated_date, status FROM course WHERE status = "active"
SELECT course_id, member_id, title, content, hit, created_date, updated_date, status FROM course WHERE course_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course(course_id, member_id, title, content, hit, created_date, updated_date, status) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{hit}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET member_id = #{memberId} , updated_date = now() WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
UPDATE course SET status = "inactive" WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
